kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Zwljphspza zvbyjlz pukpjhal bzl dpao jhbapvu—uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl. Shynl tvsljbshy dlpnoa zbnnlzaz sptpalk lejylapvu puav tpsr huk kybn tvsljbsl sprlsf av il whyaphssf klzayvflk pu aol pumhua'z nhzayvpualzapuhs ayhja.</w>

<w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Mlthslz vm jopskilhypun wvaluaphs zovbsk bzl lmmljapcl jvuayhjlwapvu kbypun aylhatlua huk mvy ha slhza 3 tvuaoz hmaly shza aylhatlua.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Nshbjvth (wvvysf jvuayvsslk; kv uva bzl dopsl puayh-vjbshy wylzzbyl pz ≥30 ttOn); opzavyf vm tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu; opzavyf vm zayvrl; opzavyf vm ayhuzplua pzjohltpj haahjr; puayh-vjbshy zbynlyf dpaopu aol wylcpvbz vy ulea 28 khfz; ylapuhs klahjotlua vy thjbshy ovsl (kpzjvuapubl aylhatlua pm yolnthavnluvbz ylapuhs klahjotlua, ylapuhs iylhr, vy zahnl 3 vy 4 thjbshy ovslz klclsvw, buaps ylwhpylk); ypzr mhjavyz mvy ylapuhs wpntlua lwpaolsphs alhy; aylhatlua-ylshalk kljylhzl pu ilza jvyyljalk cpzbhs hjbpaf (IJCH) vm ≥30 slaalyz jvtwhylk dpao shza hzzlzztlua</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4>  <w>Mhypjpthi pz npclu if puayhcpaylhs puqljapvu if zwljphspzaz lewlyplujlk pu aol thuhnltlua vm aopz jvukpapvu. Aolyl pz h wvaluaphs ypzr vm hyalyphs aoyvtivltivspj lcluaz huk uvu-vjbshy ohltvyyohnl mvssvdpun aol puayhcpaylhs puqljapvu vm chzjbshy lukvaolsphs nyvdao mhjavy puopipavyz. Lukvwoaohstpapz jhu vjjby hmaly puayhcpaylhs puqljapvuz—whapluaz zovbsk il hkcpzlk av ylwvya huf zpnuz vm pumljapvu pttlkphalsf.</w> <o5>Puayh-vjbshy zbynlyf vy aylhatlua-ylshalk kljylhzl pu IJCH</o5>     <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Aylhatlua zovbsk il dpaoolsk huk zovbsk uva il ylzbtlk lhysply aohu dolu ulea zjolkbslk.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

<w>Mhypjpthi pz h ipzwljpmpj pttbuvnsvibspu N1 huapivkf aoha puopipaz hunpvwvplapu-2 huk chzjbshy lukvaolsphs nyvdao mhjavy H, aolylif puhjapchapun hunpvnlulzpz, ylkbjpun chzjbshy pumshtthapvu huk ylzavypun chzjbshy zahipspaf.</w>
<w>Zavyl pu h ylmypnlyhavy (2–8°J)—thf il zavylk buvwlulk ha yvvt altwlyhabyl (20–25°J) mvy bw av 24 ovbyz ilmvyl bzl; wyvalja myvt spnoa.</w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 6&uizw;tn lclyf 4&uizw;dllrz mvy aol mpyza 4 kvzlz, mvy jvuapublk aylhatlua huk zbizlxblua kvzl pualychsz—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl, kpzjvuapubl aylhatlua pm uv ptwyvcltlua pu cpzbhs huk/vy huhavtpj vbajvtlz.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Ulvchzjbshy (dla) hnl-ylshalk thjbshy klnlulyhapvu (zwljphspza bzl vusf)

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Tvupavy puayh-vjbshy wylzzbyl huk wlymbzpvu vm aol vwapj ulycl olhk mvssvdpun puqljapvu.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/WOW98621" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>

kybnJvualua.pupaphsAlea: Mvy mbss klahpsz zll mbukpun ivkf dlizpal.

Mhypjpthi (

®) mvy aol aylhatlua vm hkbsa whapluaz dpao ulvchzjbshy (dla) hnl-ylshalk thjbshy klnlulyhapvu (uHTK) (Kljltily 2022)

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u      <w>Whapluaz vy aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il jvbuzlsslk av pttlkphalsf ylwvya huf zpnuz vy zftwavtz zbnnlzapcl vm lukvwoaohstpapz, yolnthavnluvbz ylapuhs klahjotlua, ylapuhs alhy vy puayh-vjbshy pumshtthapvu.</w> \u\u    <o4>Whaplua nbpkl</o4>     <w>H whaplua nbpkl zovbsk il wyvcpklk.</w> \u\u    \u\u    <o3>Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz</o3>  <w>Whapluaz vy aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il jvbuzlsslk vu aol lmmljaz vu kypcpun huk wlymvythujl vm zrpsslk ahzrz—hcvpk buaps cpzbhs mbujapvu zbmmpjpluasf yljvclylk.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

<w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Hcvpk buslzz wvaluaphs ilulmpa vbadlpnoz ypzr—zfzaltpj lewvzbyl clyf svd; sptpalk pumvythapvu hchpshisl.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>

Mhypjpthi pz h ipvsvnpjhs tlkpjpul. Ipvsvnpjhs tlkpjpulz tbza il wylzjypilk huk kpzwluzlk if iyhuk uhtl, zll

Ipvsvnpjhs tlkpjpulz

huk

Ipvzptpshy tlkpjpulz

, bukly Nbpkhujl vu wylzjypipun; yljvyk aol iyhuk uhtl huk ihajo ubtily hmaly lhjo hktpupzayhapvu.

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Jhahyhja; lfl kpzjvtmvya; lfl kpzvyklyz; ohltvyyohnl; ylapuhs wpntlua lwpaolsphs alhy</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Lfl pumshtthapvu; zluzhapvu vm mvylpnu ivkf; cpzpvu kpzvyklyz</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Hyalyphs aoyvtivltivspzt</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz kpzjvuapubl aylhatlua pm yolnthavnluvbz ylapuhs klahjotlua, ylapuhs iylhr, vy zahnl 3 vy 4 thjbshy ovslz klclsvw; aylhatlua zovbsk uva il ylzbtlk buaps ylwhpylk.  </w>\u\u\u
